params.params: The query parameters. (e.g. "?asdf=1234&foo=bar" turns in to `[{ key: "asdf", value: "1234" }, { key: "foo", value: "bar" }]`)
params.resource: The resource to request (e.g. "/asdf/1234" turns in to `["asdf", "1234"]`)

returns.headers: A list of header names (e.g. [{ key: "Content-Type", value: "application/json" }])

returns._0: resolveMode         The mode of the resolver (e.g. 5219)

request(string[],(string,string)[]).notice: Send an HTTP GET-like request to this contract

resolveMode().notice: returns the resolve mode of the contract
